info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 5:22PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Huntington, Wells and Adams Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 521 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bluffton to near Andrews. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bluffton, Decatur, Berne, Geneva, Markle, Monroe, Warren, Lancaster, Preble, Uniondale, Poneto, Mount Etna, Vera Cruz, Mcnatts, Wellsburg, Murray, Liberty Center, Mount Zion, Peterson and Buckeye. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 272 and 288. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
